title: KC Integrative Health | Naturopathic Medicine |Kansas City Integrative Health | Functional & Holistic Health Specialists. Located in the Heart of Overland Park
description: Natural & effective treatments for many conditions including infertility, endometriosis, PCOS, thyroid disease, and menopause. We provide passionate care, natural intervention, and results.
sitename: Kansas City Integrative Health | Functional & Holistic Health Specialists. Located in the Heart of Overland Park
cleaned_text: Ever find yourself wondering "why" when it comes to your health? Why did I develop this problem? Why do I feel this way? A clear distinction between conventional approaches and functional medicine is that very question: "why?". Curious about getting to the root cause? [Learn more about our approach. ](/our-approach) What We Treat Kansas City Integrative Health focuses on individualized treatment to address the root cause of your condition and get you to vibrant health. We provide [naturopathic ](/naturopathic-care)& [functional ](/functional-medicine)medicine solutions for many [different conditions](/other-conditions-treated). Naturopathic Medicine focuses on treating the root cause. This enables us to treat a wide variety of conditions by getting to what triggers the imbalance because at the heart of it, everything is connected. The comprehensive care we provide focuses on treating the person, not the diagnosis. Therefore, we also treat many other conditions that may ail you. Schedule a [consultation at no cost to you](https://www.kcnaturopathic.com/schedule-an-appointment) to determine how we can help, and if we can't help you, we'll refer you to someone who can. Treatment is Based On These Principles: Every person is genetically & biochemically unique. Naturopathic & functional medicine treats the individual (body, mind, and spirit), not the disease. Everything is connected: the body is comprised of complex interactions, and treatment must involve addressing every body system. Preventive medicine & therapeutic lifestyle change. Medicine is about empowering the patient to take control of their health. We combine cutting-edge medicine with traditional healing knowledge to ensure that you are receiving the best care. Health is not just the absence of disease, but a state of immense vitality. We Take the Time to Listen... Our providers are passionate about giving excellent care. Learn more about us. Our Office Your Next Step Start by scheduling a no-cost consultation. You can call us at [913-214-6536](tel:+19132146536) or [you can click here to fill out a form](/schedule-an-appointment). Please note that you will be called to confirm an appointment time. Please do not use our email address or contact forms to send specific or personal medical information (protected health information) and/or ask for specific medical advice - electronic communications, including email and contact forms are not secure and could result in a breach of privacy and/or confidentiality. Use of email or any other form of electronic or digital communication or any of our contact forms does not constitute forming a doctor/patient relationship.
